Bosses.Name: Face
Bosses.Strategy: Players need to stand in the lanes and look out for which coloured faces hit them with line AoEs. Do not get hit by the same colour twice and watch out for the knockback Off My Lawn.

Mechanics.Name: Lines of Fire
Mechanics.Description: Divides the room into four lanes, divided by thin, deadly line AoEs. The boss tethers to the faces outside of the arena which fire unavoidable line AoEs over each lane, that apply a debuff of the same colour of the face to players hit. Players must not get hit by the same colour twice.

Mechanics.Name: Off My Lawn
Mechanics.Description: Knocks players back one lane of the room.

Mechanics.Name: Upside Down
Mechanics.Description: Flips the faces on the edges changing their colours.

Bosses.Name: Frameworker
Bosses.Strategy: The boss creates copies of himself that mimick his massive AoE attacks.

Mechanics.Name: Leap Forward
Mechanics.Description: Boss jumps into the direction he's facing, resulting in a massive circle AoE around his landing position.

Mechanics.Name: Print Workers
Mechanics.Description: Orders copies of the boss to mimick his Leap mechanic in the direction they're facing.

Mechanics.Name: Omnidimensional Onslaught
Mechanics.Description: Cone AoEs towards the cardinals, followed by the intercardinals.

Mechanics.Name: Explosives Distribution
Mechanics.Description: Explosives appear on the conveyor belts. The amount of arrows indicates if the explosive travels to the front or the back of the arena before it goes off in a large circle AoE.

Mechanics.Name: Dispense Explosives
Mechanics.Description: Places mines in two quadrants of the arena that go off in circle AoEs if a player steps into their radius.

Mechanics.Name: Right/Left Disassembler
Mechanics.Description: Half room AoE indicated by the cast's name.

Mechanics.Name: Levelling Missile
Mechanics.Description: Targeted circle AoEs on each player.
